#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int e,f,n,i;
		cin>>e>>f;
		f=f-e;
		cin>>n;
		int val[n];
		int wt[n],j;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>val[i]>>wt[i];
		int ans[10000],min1;
		ans[0]=0;
		for(i=1;i<=f;i++)
		{
			min1=999999999;
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				int t=i-wt[j];
				if(t>=0)
				min1=min(min1,val[j]+ans[t]);
			}
			ans[i]=min1;
		}
		if(ans[f]<999999999)
		cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<ans[f]<<"."<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
